pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatially Explicit Capture-Recapture by Inverse Prediction // Estimates the density of a spatially distributed animal population sampled with an array of passive detectors, such as traps. Models incorporating distance-dependent detection are fitted by simulation and inverse prediction as proposed by Efford (2004) doi:10.1111/j.0030-1299.2004.13043.x.
